metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17371 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: gif2png 2.5.13 has a memory leak in the writefile function.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> bug is in gif2png, not libpng sbeattie> vulnerability is in a non-setuid cli tool, negligible security impact.

criterions.comment: gif2png: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
